      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.lang.String getDate​(java.lang.String prompt)
      Display a prompt and validate that the user entered a valid date MM-DD-YYYY and then return the valid value

      Display a prompt and validate that the user entered a valid integer and then return the valid value

      Display a prompt and validate that the user entered a valid integer based on a low and high range inclusively and then return the valid value

      • getIntRange

        public static int getIntRange​(java.lang.String prompt,
                              int low,
                              int high)
        Display a prompt and validate that the user entered a valid integer based on a low and high range inclusively and then return the valid value
        Parameters:
        prompt - input prompt asking the user to enter something specific
        low - the lowest valid value inclusively
        high - the highest valid value inclusively
        Returns:
        the valid user's integer input
